text: Va Fir'avn ʙa ʙuzurgoni qavmas guft: Biguzored maro, to Musoro ʙikusam va u Parvardigori xudro ʙa jori talaʙad ci tavre, ki u gumon mekunad, ki Parvardigoras uro ʙa sui mo firistodaast va uro az mo nigah medorad. Metarsam, ki Muso dinatonro digargun kunad jo dar in sarzamini Misr fasode ʙarangezad
